channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Bible Text
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Bible Text

item.title: CVE-2024-5444|2024-08-01T21:11:12.795Z -- unknown -- bible%20text
item.description: The Bible Text WordPress plugin through 0.2 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks

item.title: CVE-2024-5444|2024-07-11T06:00:03.516Z -- unknown -- bible%20text
